title: Audit Uprising Unleashed
outcome: Citizen-teacher alliances demand a full investigation into BCI decisions. They uncover years of bias and manipulation, sparking citywide outrage, confession, and truth tribunals. The Council is forced into transparency as grassroots justice takes over.

events.description: Spurred by teacher-led assemblies, citizens formally demand the Council release archived BCI decision data for full review.
Citizen volunteers, aided by veteran engineers, begin cross-examining BCI records, uncovering evidence of systematic score manipulation favoring Council-aligned zones since 2024.
Public outrage erupts. Grassroots tribunals emerge in multiple districts, where citizens, officials, and teachers confront past abuses and demand confessions and restitution.
Council factions issue televised confessions, some admitting to quiet collusion with Halden and bending BCI rules for personal gain, deepening public anger.
Mass ceremonies of public forgiveness and accountability spread across the city, laying groundwork for a new trust-based civic order—even as tensions simmer beneath the surface.
